abstract: A statement sent out to reporters from the Democratic National Committee, welcoming Donald Trump to the 2016 presidential race, with just the slightest hint of sarcasm.

headline.main: Verbatim: The D.N.C.’s Tongue-in-Cheek Welcome to Donald Trump

snippet: A statement sent out to reporters from the Democratic National Committee, welcoming Donald Trump to the 2016 presidential race, with just the slightest hint of sarcasm.
